item.description:
11 a.m. to 7 p.m.
www.ncfta.org/festival.php

FREE. No tickets necessary. Just come and enjoy a day of Fine Music, Fine Arts and Fine Food for everyone; the Festival is the premier music and arts fest in New England.

This year's performers on the outdoor Main Stage are:
•Roomful of Blues
•New Riders of the Purple Sage
•Bill Kirchen & Too Much Fun
•Girls, Guns & Glory

On our indoor Narrows stage are:
•Amy Black Band
•Dino Govoni
•Organ Trio plus One
•Liz Longley
•Rock Roberts and Friends.

The artisan vendor area will feature fine jewelers, basket weavers, glass artisans, potters and much more.
Bring a chair or blanket to sit on.
item.name: 10th Annual Narrows Festival of the Arts
